I would love a ‚Äúbig club‚Äù away for the event. My youngest daughter often recounts our day out at Wembley as one of her best experiences ever. However I understand financially a big club at home would be better in terms of overall revenue. Just so long as we don‚Äôt get Franchise I‚Äôll be happy.
